channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13660] Vectorizing IN expression with list of columns throws java.lang.ClassCastException ExprNodeColumnDesc cannot be cast to ExprNodeConstantDesc
item.description:
Example:

SELECT * FROM alltypesorc WHERE cint in (ctinyint, cbigint);
item.summary: Vectorizing IN expression with list of columns throws java.lang.ClassCastException ExprNodeColumnDesc cannot be cast to ExprNodeConstantDesc

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
